Name: The Boxmakers
Description: A Heavy-Lidded Fellow in a satin smock will smile at you. "One of ours," he will say. "We made it to order, for a zee-captain, to guard her legacy. She might tell you the phrase. We do not."

DefaultEvent.Name: Four bales of shining linen
DefaultEvent.Description: You will leave the box in a petal-drift and walk away. "Good," the Heavy-Lidded Fellow will say. "That which is never opened is always precious. That which is always precious is always worth the price. You have not regretted what you will do."

ChildBranches.Name: You will give them the box
ChildBranches.Description: "We will keep it safe for the zee-captain, in case she returned, long ago. When it was opened, it will be safe. We will compensate you."

DefaultEvent.Name: "Which is the cat's chiefest claw?"
DefaultEvent.Description: "What cage imprisons nothing?" the Fellow will say. "Where do petals begin? Where do stories end?" He beams at you. Actually, for an Iremi riddle, that's almost helpful.

ChildBranches.Name: You will ask them where to find the captain
ChildBranches.Description: "Are you sure you want to know?" the Heavy-Lidded Fellow will ask. "Perhaps she doesn't want to tell you the key-phrase, no matter how much you offer. Perhaps she wants her box back."
